properties.name: url_extension
properties.doc: /** @var string $url_extension extension use in URL default is .html */

methods.name: isRegisterCurrentRequest
methods.doc:
/**
         * Check if any Gate registered with current request
         * @return boolean
         */

methods.name: registerCurrentRequest
methods.doc:

         * Register Current Request with Gate
         * @param string $gate_dir_path Gate file path like Gates/index.Gate
         * @param string $s_namespace Optional Namespace if any
         * @param string $permtitle Title Display in Permission List
         * @param array $permlist Create Permissions List for Gate
         */

methods.name: registerCurrentGate
methods.doc:
/** * Register Current Request with different App Gate * @param string $gate

* registerCurrentGate('home') *

*/

         * @param string $gate Gate
         * @return array

methods.name: getGateURL
methods.doc:
/** * Generate URL for a Gate * @param string $gate_param Gate like index * @param string $extra

Extra query string in URL * $extra = 'test=1&mpid=13' *

* @param string $newbasePath

new domain url * $newbasePath = 'https://domain.com/test *

* @param boolean $blnSesID Add session id default false * @param string $ext change url file extension as Gate default empty and use html or set in comp file. * @param boolean $noncache default false, if true, cache can not save this url in browser or in proxy * @return string */

methods.name: getThisGateURL
methods.doc:
/** * Generate URL for Current Gate * @param string $extra

Extra query string in URL * $extra = 'test=1&mpid=13' *

* @param boolean $blnSesID Add session id default false * @param string $ext change url file extension as Gate default empty and use html or set in comp file. * @param boolean $noncache default false, if true, cache can not save this url in browser or in proxy * @return string */

methods.name: getEventURLSecure
methods.doc:
/** * Generate Secure Event URL for a Event Parameter of Gate. * If you try tamper the URL Event Parameter then it gives empty event parameter value. If you need * to pass other value also secure then you need to manually secure with function * val2Secure function and restore back with secure2Val function. By default event parameter * automatically convert by SartajPHP. * @param string $eventName

Name of Event * class index extends Sphp\tools\BasicGate{ * public function page_event_test($evtp){ * * } * } * $eventName = test * $gate_param = index * Registered Gate File = Gates/index.Gate *

* @param string $evtp Event Parameter pass to URL * @param string $gate_param Gate like index * @param string $extra

Extra query string in URL * $extra = 'test=1&mpid=13' *

* @param string $newbasePath

new domain url * $newbasePath = 'https://domain.com/test *

* @param boolean $blnSesID Add session id default false, url expired with session (Gate can allow expired url) * @param string $ext change url file extension as Gate default empty and use html or set in comp file. * @param boolean $noncache default false, if true, cache can not save this url in browser or in proxy * @return string */

methods.name: getEventURL
methods.doc:
/** * Generate URL for a Event of Gate * @param string $eventName

Name of Event * class index extends Sphp\tools\BasicGate{ * public function page_event_test($evtp){ * * } * } * $eventName = test * $gate_param = index * Registered Gate = Gates/index.Gate *

* @param string $evtp Event Parameter pass to URL * @param string $gate_param Gate like index * @param string $extra

Extra query string in URL * $extra = 'test=1&mpid=13' *

* @param string $newbasePath

new domain url * $newbasePath = 'https://domain.com/test *

* @param boolean $blnSesID Add session id default false, url expired with session (Gate can allow expired url) * @param string $ext change url file extension as Gate default empty and use html or set in comp file. * @param boolean $noncache default false, if true, cache can not save this url in browser or in proxy * @return string */
